answers.answer: It's rare for someone your age to have high blood pressure, so I would think your doctor would look for underlying causes.  Eating healthy, exercising, not smoking, avoiding salt and caffeine, along with keeping your stress level down can all help.  Heredity plays a role in high BP but usually not this young.  Youth is on your side and you may be able to get it down on your own, but until then, you need to continue taking the BP medication.  Ask your doctor to check for other conditions that affect BP, make sure he checks your kidneys.
